+    static bool is_unstable_supported(CounterNS ns) {
+      return (ns != NULL_NS) && ((ns % 3) == COM_NS);
+    }
@@ -706,0 +717,4 @@
+    static bool is_unstable_supported(const char* name) {
+      const char* comdot = "com.sun.";
+      return strncmp(name, comdot, strlen(comdot)) == 0;
+    }
